headline: Chernobyl's ghost town - in pictures
text: The school sports hall in Pripyat. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       Abandoned political paintings at the Pripyat theatre. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       A doll and letters in Pripyat primary school. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       The town is slowly disappearing into the growing foliage. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       Abandoned books at Pripyat's palace of culture. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       A cash register in the school canteen. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       Missing power cables in Pripyat. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       A Soviet stained-glass mural at the Pripyat riverside cafe. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       The school gymnasium. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       A picture and light fittings in Pripyat primary school. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       The last remaining seats in Pripyat's main cinema. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis       A hospital waiting room. Photograph: Guy Corbishley/Demotix/Corbis
